Package com.gaminghub.app.business

Interface GamesBusinessServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GamesBusinessService
public interface GamesBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to games.

  • Method Details

    • getGames

      List<GameModel> getGames()
      Retrieves all games.
      Returns:
      List of all GameModel objects

    • getGamesInRange

      List<GameModel> getGamesInRange(int limit, int offset)
      Retrieves a range of games for pagination.
      Parameters:
      limit - Number of games to retrieve
      offset - Number of games to skip before starting retrieval
      Returns:
      List of GameModel objects within the specified range

    • getFilteredGames

      List<GameModel> getFilteredGames(String genre, String platform, Float maxPrice, Float minRating)
      Retrieves a list of games filtered by specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      genre - Genre to filter by (nullable)
      platform - Platform to filter by (nullable)
      maxPrice - Maximum price to filter by (nullable)
      minRating - Minimum rating to filter by (nullable)
      Returns:
      List of filtered GameModel objects matching the criteria

    • getGameById

      GameModel getGameById(int game_id)
      Retrieves a game by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      game_id - The ID of the game to retrieve
      Returns:
      The GameModel matching the ID, or null if not found

    • addGame

      boolean addGame(GameModel game)
      Adds a new game.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameModel to add
      Returns:
      true if the game was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateGame

      boolean updateGame(GameModel game)
      Updates an existing game.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameModel with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteGame

      boolean deleteGame(int game_id)
      Deletes a game by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      game_id - The ID of the game to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteGame

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Retrieves the total count of games.
